label: no response
description: No response (NR); Not stated as progressive disease (PD) or stable disease (SD)

label: inferred response
description: Neoadjuvant therapy done, managing/treating physician interpretation not available, treatment response inferred from imaging, biomarkers, or yc stage

label: based on pathology
description: Complete clinical response based on pathology report

label: therapy given, NOS
description: Neoadjuvant therapy done, response not documented or unknown
